TMWC-05.91454063907.Descriptions: PHP provides a number of miscellaneous I/O streams that allow access to PHP's own input and output streams, the standard input, output and error file descriptors, in-memory and disk-backed temporary file streams, and filters that can manipulate other file resources as they are read from and written to. This rule prevent to exploit a vulnerable code that reads from file but doesn't sanitizes the user input
